title: Baby Mothron
summaries: Mothron is a powerful Hardmode, post-Plantera flying enemy that spawns during the Solar Eclipse event. Mothrons can pass through all blocks and attack by chasing after the player or aligning themselves horizontally with them before lunging towards them at varying speeds, inflicting heavy contact damage depending on their velocity. Occasionally, it lands on blocks to lay several Mothron Eggs that will spawn Baby Mothrons if they are not destroyed in time, much like Lepus(3DS version).

It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades. Mothron requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of its <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding <linked>banner</linked>, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.

statistics.Damage: 50/100/150
